1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Ask <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> answer. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>What <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> doing? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: e.g.:- I am reading a book.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g.:- <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> am <break time='200ms'/> reading <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> book. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Divide the students into groups of four. Ask the students to ask each other "What are you doing?" and respond. The sudents have to say what they are doing at the moment.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Divide <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> groups <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> four. <break time='200ms'/> Ask <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> ask <break time='200ms'/> each <break time='200ms'/> other <break time='200ms'/> "What <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> doing?" <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> respond. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> sudents <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> say <break time='200ms'/> what <break time='200ms'/> they <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> doing <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> moment. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Let's <break time='200ms'/> play <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> game. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

10.text: Divide the students into two groups. Ask the students to say what is happening now in or outside the classroom. The group which says more sentences will win.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Divide <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> two <break time='200ms'/> groups. <break time='200ms'/> Ask <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> say <break time='200ms'/> what <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> happening <break time='200ms'/> now <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> or <break time='200ms'/> outside <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> classroom. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> group <break time='200ms'/> which <break time='200ms'/> says <break time='200ms'/> more <break time='200ms'/> sentences <break time='200ms'/> will <break time='200ms'/> win. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
